sense.def:
Sweat
je slana brezbarvna tekočina, ki se nam nabira na koži, kadar nam je vroče ali kadar smo bolni ali prestrašeni.

seg.quote: Jack paused, wiping the sweat from his face.

sense.def:
To sweat
pomeni, da se človeku na koži nabira znoj.

seg.quote: I lay and sweated in bed.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
in a sweat
ali
in a cold sweat
, se močno poti, zlasti ker je prestrašen ali bolan.

seg.quote: He awoke trembling and in a cold sweat.
